engine.Swimmer

Class Swimmer

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.Swimmer.SwimmerContestsController
      • engine.Swimmer.Swimmer

  • public class Swimmer
extends SwimmerContestsController
    Class that holds all the info of a swimmer, including its contests too.
    See Also:
    SwimmerContestsController
